data.text:
@chr1swallace About April 2020. 

Massive fail if the aim was to diagnose everyone to facilitate isolation and contact tracing.
@MayaGhoussaini Hope yours is better soon too. Heard there are 6 in the class newly off today. Keep thinking it will run out of kids to infect, and then it doesn't...
@chr1swallace Sorry to hear - hopefully getting better soon!
@chr1swallace Same symptoms here. Hope they feel better soon!
@chr1swallace Child with covid in this house, no symptoms. Huge headache!
@chr1swallace At the very least, since omicron, although even delta varied from this list. Yours sounds very much like our probably omicron infection
